item.title: Lecture Notes
item.description: [T] = Teaching Notes from the Sloan Communication Program, courtesy of JoAnne Yates. Used with permission. SESÂ # TOPICS RESOURCES 1 Introduction to the Course; Strategy and Structure To define the characteristics of managerial communication To understand how to create a communication strategy Communicating Strategically (PDF) 2 Strategy and Structure (cont.) To understand the difference between direct and indirect structure To learn when to use direct structure and when to use indirect structure 3 Oral Presentations
